navigation.activity_explanation: Channels that have not uploaded a video for over 90 days are classified as inactive.

button.copy_url: Copy the URL of this page

search.input_prompt: Enter the name of the channel

register.title: Submit new VTuber channel
register.input_channel: Enter the channel ID, started with UC
register.check_before_submit: Please check the channel info again before submitting.

complete.title: Channel submitted
complete.description: Thank you for submitting the channel. We will add it to the channel database after verification.

info.id_explanation: Channel ID is the code following the URL of the channel, such as https://www.youtube.com/channel/
info.id_link: You can check the channel ID from this site.
info.full_vtuber_explanation: Channels primarily featuring VTuber models (Live2D or 3D) from the first content and having a VTuber model as the main character of the content
info.all_vtuber_explanation: Channels that primarily feature VTuber models after having other contents for a period of time. These channels will only appear in the 'All VTubers' category.
info.type_note: In both cases, the channels must be created by Thais, primarily targeting Thai audiences, and have uploaded some contents.

error.not_begin_with_uc: Channel ID must start with UC
error.length_mismatched: Channel ID must be 24 characters long
error.already_existed: This channel is already in the database

error.not_found_description: Page not found ({route}). Please check the URL again.
error.empty_channel_description: Unable to display information.\nPlease check your internet connection,\nor notify the developer to correct the issue
